hero.title: HCIS - Lab Overview
hero.subtitle: A brief overview of HCIS Lab from the perspective of vision, research areas and skills

lab.name: HCIS Lab
lab.institution: Department of Computer Science, National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University
lab.description: HCIS Lab develops Human-Centered Physical AI Systems with focus on intelligent driving systems, assistive robotics, computer vision, and machine learning. Our research advances safe and trustworthy AI for real-world applications in autonomous systems and human-robot interaction.

features.title: Team Overview
features.description: Visualize your team's skill distribution across categories and identify expertise areas.

features.title: Gap Analysis
features.description: Discover skill gaps and prioritize areas for team development and recruitment.

features.title: Easy Updates
features.description: Update team member skills through an intuitive interface with GitHub PR generation.
